OK, I see the Credential-related classes.  Now in the CredentialStore
class=
 there is a create() method.  Can I use this method to
programmatically cre=
ate a Credential during the course of crawling
when I discover forms whose =
submission needs an HTTP POST?

hael Stack <stack@...> wrote:

>

figured to supply login
